name: vega-wordcloud
description: Wordcloud layout transform for Vega dataflows.
author: Jeffrey Heer (http://idl.cs.washington.edu)

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g vega-canvas:vega,vega-dataflow:vega,vega-scale:vega,vega-statistics:vega,vega-util:vega -f umd -n vega.transforms -o build/vega-wordcloud.js -- index.js
